00034 EngineBase::~EngineBase()
00035 {
00036     kdDebug() << k_funcinfo << endl;
00037 
00038     closeMixerHW();
00039 }
00040 
00042 
00043 bool EngineBase::initMixerHW()
00044 {
00045     if ( ( m_mixerHW = ::open( "/dev/mixer", O_RDWR ) ) < 0 )
00046         return false;  //failed
00047     else
00048     {
00049         int devmask, recmask, i_recsrc, stereodevs;
00050         if ( ioctl( m_mixerHW, SOUND_MIXER_READ_DEVMASK, &devmask )       == -1 ) return false;
00051         if ( ioctl( m_mixerHW, SOUND_MIXER_READ_RECMASK, &recmask )       == -1 ) return false;
00052         if ( ioctl( m_mixerHW, SOUND_MIXER_READ_RECSRC, &i_recsrc )       == -1 ) return false;
00053         if ( ioctl( m_mixerHW, SOUND_MIXER_READ_STEREODEVS, &stereodevs ) == -1 ) return false;
00054         if ( !devmask )                                                           return false;
00055     }
00056 
00057     return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 void EngineBase::closeMixerHW()
00062 {
00063     if ( m_mixerHW != -1 )
00064     {
00065         ::close( m_mixerHW );   //close /dev/mixer device
00066         m_mixerHW = -1;
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 void EngineBase::setVolumeHW( int percent )
00072 {
00073     if ( m_mixerHW != -1 )
00074     {
00075         percent = percent + ( percent << 8 );
00076         ioctl( m_mixerHW, MIXER_WRITE( 4 ), &percent );
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 void EngineBase::setXfadeLength( int ms )
00082 {
00083     m_xfadeLength = ms;
00084 }

00087 void EngineBase::setSoundOutput( const QString& output )
00088 {
00089     kdDebug() << "Setting sound output to: " << output << endl;
00090     
00091     m_soundOutput = output;
00092 }
